name: Raft Frenzy
description:
The player jumps from raft to raft on a ocean filled with raft. The rafts slowly sink so you need to jump to another raft before yours sinks. The water is infested with sharks that destroy rafts and kill you as soon as you enter the water.

Win - the player keeps gaining points 

Lose-  the player falls into the water and is killed by a shark
